body:
spack_cross platform is used for cross compile environment.

The backend OS and target is defined following environment varibles:
 
- SPACK_BACKEND_OS            
  - Operating system (if not set, same as frontend OS)
-  SPACK_BACKEND_OS_VERSION 
   - Version of the operating system (if not set, same as frontend OS version)
-   SPACK_BACKEND_TARGET
    - Target
title: Add platform spack_cross for cross compile environment.
